name: Centered Youtube (HD) - January 29th, 2014
description:
Fixes that annoying left page alignment.
--HD PLAYER--

Want the WIDER version?
http://userstyles.org/styles/97496/centered-youtube-hd-wide-january-23rd-2014
Want the centered but Normal sized version?
http://userstyles.org/styles/79636/centered-youtube-december-3rd-2013
additional_info:
UPDATE 1: Centered video.
=Bug Fix 1: Fixed Centered issue with Video Results page.
=Bug Fix 2: Fixed Conflicting code, making some pages centered to far right/left.
UPDATE 2: Fixed "Show more" description button to be more centered
UPDATE 3: Moved the title of the video and subscribe/username back to the top of the video.
=Bug Fix 3: Fixed a coding error causing the page to extend to the right on the video page. 
UPDATE 4: Fixed the size of the font for the title of the videos, was colliding with picture of user and sub button.
-------December 10th, 2012-------
=Bug Fix 4: Fixed a banner issue on "vevo" music video pages that caused the banner to overlap with certain buttons "like, dislike" etc.
UPDATE 5: Fixed unreadable video title on "vevo" music video pages with a soft white glow around the title.
UPDATE 6: Fixed unreadable username/text of the video content uploader, with a soft white glow.
UPDATE 7: fixed "Guide" menu to be transparent and with a glow around text. Makes for a cleaner look.
UPDATE 8: Background is now the older grayish style than YouTube's new plain white. (Seems easier on the eyes)
UPDATE 9: Added drop shadows to certain items, gives it a more focused look. + Moved the "Like and dislike" buttons to the right. Stops from accidentally clicking "like"
Instead of trying to hit play.
------December 11th, 2012------
=Bug Fix 5: Fixed the User "Uploaded Video" bar that shows up above the video player, from disappearing behind the player. Moved it slightly right of it.

------January 2nd, 2013-----
UPDATE 10: Fixed the appearance of the text shadow on the Vevo pages of music videos.
------January 25th, 2013-----
UPDATE 11: Changed background to Transparent on the video selection page.
------February 1st, 2013-----
=Bug Fix 6: Banner on Vevo pages blocking like and dislike button fixed.
------February 12th, 2013-----
UPDATE 12: Fixed alignment of the menu in the "Test Tube" section of YouTube.
------November 19th, 2013-----
UPDATE 13: Updated code, Better format, However many ugly things are still around.
------November 27th, 2013-----
=Bug Fix 7: Html5 videos no longer stick to the top left corner of the player in a small box, it now fills the player like it should.
=Bug Fix 8: Results page no longer stretches over to the right.
------December 3rd, 2013-----
Update 14: Guide menu besides the video player now has a white background for easier reading.
UPDATE 15: Centered the video sidebar suggestion's from being to the right of the screen.
------December 11th, 2013----
=Bug Fix 9: HTML5 4x3 videos were not centered properly. This has been hopefully fixed.
------December 13th, 2013----
UPDATE 16: Fixed the playlist bar from being above the video and messing up alignment.
------December 18th, 2013----
=Bug Fix 10: Some annotations alignment would become screwed up, I hopefully fixed this.
------December 27th, 2013----
=Bug Fix 11: Html5 videos weren't pausing when the video was clicked on. Fixed.
------January 7th, 2014----
UPDATE 17: Fixed the Dropdown menu at the top from being left aligned.
------January 29th, 2014----
=Bug Fix 12: Html5 didn't fill the player size, this was due to YouTube coding change.
